text: Noah Wyle (born June 4, 1971) is an American actor. ==Roles== ===Television=== He is best known for his role as John Carter in the television series ER (1994–2009). This earned him nominations for three Golden Globe Awards and five Primetime Emmy Awards. He is also known for his roles as: *Flynn Carsen in The Librarian franchise including three TV movies, **The Librarian: Quest for the Spear (2004) **The Librarian: Return to King Solomon's Mine (2006) **The Librarian: Curse of the Judas Chalice (2008) then returning for the television series (2013–2018) *Tom Mason in the television series Falling Skies (2011–2015) ===Movies=== He has appeared in movies such as A Few Good Men (1992), Pirates of Silicon Valley (1999), Donnie Darko (2001), and W. (2008). Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors
title: Noah Wyle
